channel.title: Making an integer into a long?
channel.description:
I want to make the maximumItemAmount into a long instead of an integer so that I can have more than 2147mil but when i do public long maxItemAmount = Max_Long_Value; it gives errors saying that something bad will happen.
Anyone know if this is possible.
